glossary.meaning: Open Network Video Interface Forum standard for IP cameras.
Real Time Streaming Protocol for media streams.
Simple Service Discovery Protocol for UPnP devices.

recommendations: Open the web UI to confirm device identity.
If RTSP is available, open in VLC to validate streams.
Verify credentials locally; do not attempt unauthorized access.
Label the device and record its physical location.
Re-scan after changes to confirm inventory.

httpTitle.meaning: Page title can hint at device UI.
